pkgmetadata.longdescription: Numeric and Color Sequences with Non-Linear Interpolation // When visualising changes between two values over time, a strict linear interpolation can look jarring and unnatural. By applying a non-linear easing to the transition, the motion between values can appear smoother and more natural. This package includes functions for applying such non-linear easings to colors and numeric values, and is useful where smooth animated movement and transitions are desired.
